I got bitten pretty nastily by the resize bug, too. The weird thing is, the parts I used TweakScale on weren't affected at all. Quitting and restarting KSP was no help, so I finally issued a destruct command.

Congrats, Beale: With your parts, my little cousin managed to build a rocket that could *easily* make it into orbit. Don't know if that is a compliment or not :-)

- - - Updated - - -

Also, I think the tweakscale bug is due to tweakscale, not Tantares. I've seen it happening with some other mods.

Also, I think the tweakscale bug is due to tweakscale, not Tantares. I've seen it happening with some other mods.

That's just it. The affected parts weren't tweaked whatsoever, while other untweaked parts remained normal. And the tweaked parts were fine.

After restarting KSP and relaunching the Spektr module, everything was A-OK.

ETA: Finished docking the last mudule this afternoon. She's done!

A small step in to talk about the scaling bug.

It's not related to tweakscale, but instead a long-standing bug with the MODEL{} system.

There is a fix (you will notice for example the LK capsule never shrinks, see that config for how the fix works), but I haven't had the time to implement everywhere.

PPTS decoupler.

Alternate Progress core with 0.9375m Top

Alternate Progress core with 0.9375m Top

http://puu.sh/jdyf7/c00e03b06a.jpg

It's... It's beautiful!

It's... It's beautiful!

Looking nice, Beale!

Hey everyone! I wanted to share some pictures from my latest Kerbaling:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Afraid I have to ask a dumb question here: I've just set up a new GameData folder to "switch off" with my previous one, and added RealFuels (with stockalike config) and Tantares.

While this combination seems fine for the Pavonis engine, the Pavonis fuel tank only allows "Liquid Fuel/Oxidizer" and "Liquid Hydrogen/Oxidizer", while the Pavonis engine only uses "Kerosene + Liquid Oxygen" or "Ethanol75 + Liquid Oxygen".

The result is a Pavonis that is not going to space, or anywhere for that matter, on account of having an engine and a fuel tank that are incompatible.

Now, obviously (hopefully) I screwed something up. But I'm not savvy enough to be able to identify the "what" very easily. I've tried a search to no avail, so is there anyone kind enough to knock me in the right direction here?

------ Edit ------

Upon further review, this appears to be true for all Tantares fuel tanks, as well as for fuel tanks from some (but not all) other mods, so I suppose whatever I messed up, it wasn't Tantares-specific after all.

Edited July 26, 2015 by Landwalker

A small step in to talk about the scaling bug.

It's not related to tweakscale, but instead a long-standing bug with the MODEL{} system.

There is a fix (you will notice for example the LK capsule never shrinks, see that config for how the fix works), but I haven't had the time to implement everywhere.

PPTS decoupler.

http://puu.sh/jdy84/6af485cbc2.jpg

Alternate Progress core with 0.9375m Top

http://puu.sh/jdyf7/c00e03b06a.jpg

Nice! Looked up LK capsule's config instantly: 

MODEL
{
   model = Tantares/Parts/LK/LK_Crew_A
   scale = 1.25, 1.25, 1.25
}

BTW, liking the thick-necked Progress.

It's... It's beautiful!
I WAS GOING TO SAY THAT!

Hey everyone! I wanted to share some pictures from my latest Kerbaling:

http://imgur.com/a/PYuoF

Afraid I have to ask a dumb question here: I've just set up a new GameData folder to "switch off" with my previous one, and added RealFuels (with stockalike config) and Tantares.

While this combination seems fine for the Pavonis engine, the Pavonis fuel tank only allows "Liquid Fuel/Oxidizer" and "Liquid Hydrogen/Oxidizer", while the Pavonis engine only uses "Kerosene + Liquid Oxygen" or "Ethanol75 + Liquid Oxygen".

The result is a Pavonis that is not going to space, or anywhere for that matter, on account of having an engine and a fuel tank that are incompatible.

Now, obviously (hopefully) I screwed something up. But I'm not savvy enough to be able to identify the "what" very easily. I've tried a search to no avail, so is there anyone kind enough to knock me in the right direction here?

The configs might be out of date, I will download RO when I have an time and take a look

Nice! Looked up LK capsule's config instantly: 
MODEL
{
   model = Tantares/Parts/LK/LK_Crew_A
   scale = 1.25, 1.25, 1.25
}

BTW' date=' liking the thick-necked Progress. [/quote']

As well as the scale = 1.25 in the model node, you also need.

  • rescaleFactor = 1.0
  • Node positions multiply them by 1.25

That is the complete fix for any person who needs to fix urgently
